name: Untilted
description:
Welcome to Untitled

This is a Game Boy demo that was mostly just a proof of concept and see-if-I-can-do-it kind of project for myself. I'm aware it has quite a few bugs that need ironing out.

You'll find:

- 6 Collectible Items (even though you have slots for 9)

- Puzzles

- Light top-down adventure style combat

- A boss fight

- A functional Save/Load system

- An unfortunate Clown

The GB Studio file and ROM build are provided below for anyone interested in playing or tweaking it.

I'm keeping a running tab of known bugs that I want to iron out, so please feel free to comment about any you find.
